content:
Einzig family

1 Samuel EINZIG                      1777-82 - 1825 #108 (Wolf)
 + Malka SZWARC                      1777-82 - 1851 #219 (Herschel)
       married Mar 25, 1800 Krakow
  2o Feigel EINZIG                   Apr 26, 1803 Krakow
  2x Israel Lebl EINZIG              Jul 8, 1805 Krakow
  2o Hinda Dvora EINZIG              Oct 18, 1808 Krakow - May 31, 1878 #218
    * Moses Hirsch BINENSTOCK        Dec 7, 1802 Krakow - May 13, 1875 #140
          married Nov 28, 1823 #36
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Herszl Dawid EINZIG             1817 #73
    + Hai GLAZER                     1817-19
     3x Samuel Wolf EINZIG           1841 #35 - after 1911
       + Beila?Keila GERSTNER        1844 Chrzanow
        4o Chaja EINZIG              1867* #60
        4x Moses Hirsch EINZIG (twin)  Jan 11, 1876 #269
        4o Malka Reisel EINZIG (twin)  Jan 11, 1876 #270 - May 19, 1879 #151
        4x Salomon Juda EINZIG       Aug 14, 1878 #513 - Jun 5, 1884 #249
        4o Ester EINZIG              Oct 17, 1880 #719
     3o Adela EINZIG                 Aug 17, 1843 (1844 #267)
